description: GitHub Mode package requirements that must be merged with (not replace) the current OpenClaw package set.
notes: Run `node --import tsx .GITHUB-MODE/scripts/validate-github-mode-package-list.ts` to sync this file and package.json.
The script auto-discovers package imports from .GITHUB-MODE/scripts/*.ts and .GITHUB-MODE/test/*.ts.
If a GitHub Mode package is missing from root package.json, it is automatically added using requiredVersions.
